description:
"Later" (保留 Horyū, lit. On Hold/Deferred) is a recurring black cat that is owned by Misaka 10032. Originally only appearing in the third volume of Toaru Majutsu no Index, the cat receives expanded appearances in the Toaru Kagaku no Railgun manga, where its significance to the Misaka clones is much more prominent.
(Source: fandom.com)
name: Horyuu
